front.title: Support for Language Translation in E-Mail and Netnews

abstract.t: This memo specifies extensions to e-mail and netnewsstandards, to allow for the submission of translations ofmessages, not only at initial submission time, but also atlater time, and made by other translators than the originalauthor of the message. Three new e-mail/netnews headerfields are proposed, 'Content-Translation-Of', 'Content-Translator' and 'Translation-Request'.
